item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-138
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) to Diamond Lake, Roseburg, and Medford.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-58
item.description: US-97 South at OR-58 in Klamath County. Use OR-58 west to Eugene and Oakridge (via Willamette Pass). Continue south on US-97 for Klamath Falls and California.

item.title: Powers Road West at US-97 North (Bend Parkway)
item.description: Powers Road West at US-97 North (Bend Parkway) to Redmond.

item.title: Powers Road East Approaching US-97 North
item.description: Powers Road East approaching US-97 North

item.title: SE Scott Ave. West at US-97 South
item.description: SE Scott Ave. West at US-97 South (Bend Parkway) to Klamath Falls. SE Scott Ave. becomes NW Colorado Ave. westbound. Use NW Colorado Ave. to Mt. Bachelor (Ski Area).

item.title: SE Scott St. West at US-97
item.description: SE Scott St. West at US-97 (Bend Parkway) onramp (Exit 138). Use US-97 north for Redmond; US-97 south for Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-293
item.description: US-97 south at OR-293. Use OR-293 east to Antelope, John Day Fossil Beds, and Fossil.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-293
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-293 in Jefferson County.

item.title: US-97 South - Jefferson County
item.description: Entering Jefferson County on US-97 South.

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south. Distance to Madras, Redmond, and Bend.

item.title: US-97 North at US-197 - Wasco County
item.description: US-97 North at US-197 in Wasco County. Use US-197 north for Maupin and The Dalles; US-97 North for Wasco and Biggs.

item.title: End US-197 South Approaching US-97
item.description: End US-197 South approaching US-97. Use US-97 south for Madras and Bend; US-97 north for Biggs and Wasco.

item.title: US-197 South Approaching US-197
item.description: US-197 South approaching US-197. Use US-97 north for Wasco and Biggs; US-97 south for Madras and Bend.

item.title: US-97 North/US-26 West at US-26/US-97 Split
item.description: US-97 North/US-26 West at US-26/US-97 Split. Turn right to continue north on US-97.

item.title: US-97 North/US-26 West Approaching US-97/US-26 Split
item.description: US-97 North/US-26 West Approaching US-97/US-26 split in Madras. Turn right for US-97 North to Biggs and The Dalles. Continue straight for US-26 West to Mount Hood and Portland.

item.title: US-26 West at US-97 - Jefferson County
item.description: US-26 West at US-97 in Jefferson County. Turn left for US-97 south to Redmond and Bend; turn right for US-97 North/US-26 West to Madras. US-26 West joins US-97 North through Madras.

item.title: US-97 South at I-84/US-30 East (Exit 104)
item.description: US-97 south at I-84/US-30 East (Exit 104) junction. Turn left on I-84/US-30 east for Rufus and Pendleton. Continue south on US-97 for Wasco and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South at I-84/US-30 West
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 West (Exit 104). Turn right for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles and Portland. The Columbia River and the hills of Washington state are in the background of this photograph.

item.title: US-97 South at WA-14
item.description: Turn right for WA-14 West to Vancouver. Turn left for WA-14 East to Kennwick and US-97 South/To I-84 to Bend (Oregon). US-97 south joins WA-14 east for a short distance.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching WA-14
item.description: US-97 South approaching WA-14 in Klickitat County. Use US-97 South/WA-14 East to Bend (Oregon - via US-97) and Kennewick (via WA-14).

item.title: US-97 South Approaching Simcoe Road
item.description: US-97 South approaching Simcoe Road to Goldendale Industrial Park.

item.title: US-97 South at WA-142 West
item.description: US-97 South at WA-142 West to Goldendale and Klickitat.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching WA-142
item.description: US-97 South approaching WA-142 west to Goldendale and Klickitat.

item.title: US-97 South - Goldendale Intersections
item.description: Goldendale - Next 2 Intersections on US-97 south. Goldendale is the county seat of Klickitat County.

item.title: US-97 South - Satus Pass
item.description: Satus Pass - Elevation 3107 Feet on US-97 south. Satus Pass is a summit in the Simcoe Mountains.

item.title: US-97 South - Klickitat County
item.description: Entering Klickitat County on US-97 south.

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south. Distance to Goldendale and Bend, Ore.

item.title: US-97 South - Next Services
item.description: US-97 South - Next Services 49 Miles (in Goldendale).

item.title: US-97 South - Yakima County
item.description: US-97 South in Yakima County.

item.title: US-97 South at WA-22
item.description: US-97 South at WA-22 junction. Turn right to continue south on US-97 to Goldendale.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching WA-22
item.description: US-97 South approaching WA-22. Turn left on WA-22 West for Prosser and I-82. Turn right to continue south on US-97 towards Goldendale. Continue straight on the Yakima Valley Highway for WA-22 east.

item.title: US-97 South - Fort Road Jct.
item.description: US-97 South at Fort Road Jct. Turn right for White Swan; left for Toppenish.

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south. Distance to Wapato and Toppenish.

item.title: US-97 South - Yakima Nation
item.description: Entering the Yakima Nation on US-97 South.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 37
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 37 - US-97 South/Goldendale/Bend, Ore. US-97 joins I-82 west to I-90 near Ellensburg. I-82/US-12 East overhead to Richland and Pendleton (Oregon).

item.title: I-82 East - Exits 31A and 31B
item.description: I-82 east at Exits 31B - N 1st St. and Exit 31A - US-12 West/Naches. Continue east on I-82 for Richland. US-12 joins I-82 eastbound here to Richland.

item.title: I-82 East - Exits 31B and 31A - Entering Yakima
item.description: Entering Yakima on I-82 east crossing the Yakima River bridge. Approaching Exit 31B - N 1st St. and Exit 31A - US-12 West/Naches.

item.title: I-82 East - Yakima Exits
item.description: I-82 East - Yakima Next 4 Exits

item.title: I-82 East - Exits 31B and 31A
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 31B - N 1st St. and approaching Exit 31A - US-12 West/Naches. US-12 joins I-82 eastbound to Richland.

item.title: I-82 East approaching US-12 Jct.
item.description: I-82 East approaching US-12 Jct. in Yakima County.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 30
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 30 - WA-823 East/Rest Haven Road/Selah.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 29
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 29 - East Selah Road.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 26 - WA-821 North/To WA-823/Selah.

item.title: I-82 East - Yakima County
item.description: Entering Yakima County on I-82 east.

item.title: I-82 East - North Umtanum Ridge
item.description: I-82 East at North Umtanum Ridge - Elevation 2315 Feet.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 11
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 11 - Military Area.

item.title: I-82 East - Manastash Ridge
item.description: I-82 East at Manastash Ridge - Elevation 2672 Feet.

item.title: End WA-821 North at I-82
item.description: End WA-821 North at I-82. Use I-82 east to Yakima; I-82 west to Ellensburg.

item.title: I-82 Exit 3 Offramp at WA-821
item.description: I-82 Exit 3 Offramp at WA-821/Thrall Road.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 3
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 3 - WA-821 South/Thrall Road.

item.title: I-82 South - Exit 3
item.description: I-82 south approaching Exit 3 - WA-821 South/Thrall Road.

item.title: I-82 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-82 south. Distance to Jct. WA-821, Selah, and Yakima.

item.title: I-82 East/US-97 South - Kittitas County
item.description: I-82 East/US-97 South - Kittitas County. This is the first I-82 shield on I-82 eastbound.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 110
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 110 - I-82 East/US-97 South/Yakima. Continue east on I-90 for Spokane. US-97 south leaves I-90 eastbound here. This is the western end of I-82.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 110
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 110 - I-82 East/US-97 South/Yakima. Continue east on I-90 for Spokane. US-97 south leaves I-90 eastbound here. This is the western end of I-82.

item.title: Canyon Road North at I-90
item.description: Canyon Road North at I-90 in Ellensburg. Turn right for I-90 East/To I-82/Spokane/Yakima. Continue under the freeway for I-90 West/Seattle.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 109 and 110
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 109 - Canyon Road/Ellensburg. Approaching Exit 110 - I-82 East/US-97 South/Yakima.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 109
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 109 - Canyon Road/Ellensburg.

item.title: US-97 South at I-90 East
item.description: US-97 South at I-90 East towards Yakima in Ellensburg. Turn left for (Washington) State Patrol. US-97 south joins I-90 east through Ellensburg.

item.title: US-97 South at I-90
item.description: US-97 South at I-90 in Ellensburg. Turn right for I-90 West to Seattle. Continue over freeway for I-90 East to Spokane and US-97 South to Yakima. US-97 southbound joins I-90 east through Ellensburg.

item.title: US-97 South at University Way
item.description: US-97 south at University Way in Ellensburg. Turn right on University Way for US-97 South To I-90, Yakima, and Spokane. Turn left for Ellensburg.

item.title: US-97 South/To I-90 - Ellensburg
item.description: US-97 South/To I-90 in Ellensburg.

item.title: US-97 South at Faust Road
item.description: US-97 South at Faust Road in Ellensburg. Turn right to continue south on US-97 towards I-90 and Yakima. Continue straight on Old Highway 10 for Ellensburg.

item.title: US-97 South In Ellensburg
item.description: US-97 South In Ellensburg approaching Faust Road. Turn right on Faust Road to continue south on US-97 towards Yakima.

item.title: US-97 South at WA-10
item.description: US-97 South at WA-10 in Kittitas County. Turn right for WA-10 west to Cle Elum; left to continue south on US-97 to Ellensburg.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching WA-10
item.description: US-97 South approaching WA-10 west to Cle Elum in Kittitas County.

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south. Distance to Ellensburg and Yakima.

item.title: US-97 South at WA-970 (To I-90)
item.description: US-97 South at WA-970 in Kittitas County. Use WA-970 West for I-90, Cle Elum, and Seattle. Turn left to continue south on US-97 towards Ellensburg and Yakima.

item.title: US-97 South - Blewett Pass
item.description: US-97 South at Blewett Pass - Elevation 4102 Feet. Entering Kittitas County. Blewett Pass is at the summit of the Wenatchee Mountains.

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-97 south. Distance to Cle Elum (via WA-970), Ellensburg, and Seattle (via WA-970 and I-90). This type of distance marker with the route name on top is not typical in Washington.

item.title: US-97 South at US-2/US-97 Jct.
item.description: US-97 South at US-2/US-97 Jct. Continue south for US-97/To I-90/To WA-970 to Cle Elum, Ellensburg, and Seattle. Turn left for US-2 East/US-97 North onramp to Wenatchee. US-97 south leaves US-2 westbound here.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South At US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at the US-2/US-97 split. Use US-97 South to I-90/Ellensburg/Seattle (via Snoqualmie Pass). Use US-2 West to Leavenworth, Stevens Pass and Seattle (via Stevens Pass).

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching US-2/US-97 Split. Use US-97 south for WA-970/I-90 to Cle Elum, Ellensburg, and Seattle. A variable speed limit sign shows the speed as 60 MPH.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-285
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-285 in Wenatchee. Merge left for (WA-285 South) to Ellensburg. Continue straight for US-2 West/US-97 South to Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-285
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-285. Use right lane for US-2 West/US-97 South to Ellensburg and Seattle. Continue straight for WA-285 South to Wenatchee and Mission Ridge Ski Area.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-285
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-285 in Wenatchee. Use right lane to continue on US-2 West/US-97 South to Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South at Alt. US-97 North
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at Alt. US-97 North to Entiat and Chelan.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-97 Alt. North
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching US-97 Alt. North to Entiat and Chelan. Entering Chelan County and crossing the Columbia River.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-28
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-28 in Douglas County. Turn right to continue on US-2 West/US-97 South towards Ellensburg, Seattle, and Wenatchee (on the other bank of the Columbia River). Continue straight for WA-28 East to Quincy, East Wenatchee and I-90. Turn left for Eastmont Ave.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-28
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-28 in Douglas County.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-28
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-28 in Douglas County. Use US-2 West/US-97 South for Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-2 West/US-97 South. Distance to East Wenatchee and Quincy. Both of those cities are via WA-28.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Douglas County
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South shields in Douglas County.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-2 West/US-97 South. Distance to Wenatchee, Cashmere, and Leavenworth.

item.title: US-2 West at US-97
item.description: US-2 West at US-97 in Orondo. Turn right for US-97 north to Chelan and Okanogan. Turn left for US-2 West/(US-97 South) to Wenatchee. US-97 south joins US-2 west to Cashmere.

item.title: US-2 West at Connection to US-97 North
item.description: US-2 West at connection to US-97 North in Orondo. Turn right for US-97 north; left for US-2 west.

item.title: US-2 West at US-97 North
item.description: US-2 West at US-97 North. Turn right for connection to US-97 North/Chelan/Okanogan. Merge left for US-2 West towards Wenatchee.

item.title: US-2 West Approaching US-97
item.description: US-2 West approaching US-97 in Orondo.

item.title: Oregon St. West at US-97 South
item.description: Oregon St. West at US-97 South to Weed (California). Continue west for Lake of the Woods and Medford (both via Lakeshore Drive and OR-140).

item.title: OR-39 North (6th St.) at Crater Lake Parkway
item.description: OR-39 North (6th St.) at Crater Lake Parkway. Turn right to continue north on OR-39 to US-97, Crater Lake, and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South - Entering Tonasket
item.description: Entering Tonasket on US-97 South.

item.title: US-97 South - Speed Limit
item.description: Speed limit on US-97 south. Speed 60 MPH / 100 KmH. This is the only speed limit sign south of the border with dual measurement systems.

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south. Distance to Oroville, Omak, and Wenatchee. This is the first distance marker on US-97 in the United States.

item.title: US-97 South - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington - The Evergreen State on US-97 south. Taken just south of US Customs at the US-Canadian border.

item.title: US-97 South - Exiting US Customs
item.description: Turn right for US-97 South - Exiting US Customs Port of Oroville facility.

item.title: Begin US-97 South - US Customs
item.description: Welcome to the United States of America - Oroville, Washington Land Port of Entry at the beginning of US-97 south. Taken at the Canadian-USA boundary.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching US-2/US-97 split. Use US-97 South to I-90/Ellensburg/Seattle (via Snoqualmie Pass). Use US-2 West to Leavenworth, Stevens Pass and Seattle (via Stevens Pass).

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-2/US-97 Split. Use US-97 south for WA-970/I-90 to Cle Elum, Ellensburg, and Seattle.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Bus. US-2/US-97
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South - Bus. US-2/US-97 Junction to Cashmere.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-2 West/US-97 South. Distance to Leavenworth, Stevens Pass, and Monroe.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-2 West/US-97 South. Distance to Cashmere, Everett, and Seattle.

item.title: End WA-285 North at US-2/US-97/To WA-28
item.description: End WA-285 North at US-2/US-97/To WA-28. Use US-2 East/US-97 North/To WA-28 for Okanogan and Spokane. Use US-2 West/US-97 South for Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: WA-285 North Approaching US-2/US-97 Jct.
item.description: WA-285 North Approaching US-2/US-97 Jct. Use right lane for access to Alt. US-97 to Chelan and Entiat.

item.title: WA-285 North Approaching US-2/US-97/To WA-28
item.description: WA-285 North approaching US-2 East/US-97 North/To WA-28 to Spokane and Seattle. Also approaching Easy St., Penny Road, and Olds Station junction in Wenatchee.

item.title: WA-28 West at WA-285 - East Wenatchee
item.description: WA-28 West at WA-285 in East Wenatchee. Turn left for WA-285 North to Wenatchee. Continue west on WA-28 to US-2 and US-97. The signs directing traffic on WA-28 are an electronic sign.

item.title: WA-28 West approaching WA-285
item.description: WA-28 West approaching WA-285 in East Wenatchee. Turn left for WA-285. Continue straight for WA-28 to US-2 and US-97.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching US-97 North
item.description: US-20 east approaching Empire Blvd. jct. Use Empire Blvd. for US-97 North access towards Redmond and Portland.

item.title: US-20 East at Robal Road
item.description: US-20 East at Robal Road. Use Robal Road east for Redmond and US-97 North.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-31
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-31. Use OR-31 south for Reno (Nevada).

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-31
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-31. Use OR-31 south for Silver Lake and Lakeview.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 153
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 153 - Century Drive/Sunriver. This is the southern end of the divided highway which begins north of Redmond.

item.description: US-97 south at Exit 151 - Cottonwood Road.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 143
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 143 - Baker Road/Knott Road.

item.title: US-97 South at Bus. US-97 Jct.
item.description: US-97 South at Bus. US-97/Third St. junction. This is the southern end of the Bend, Oregon business loop, and also the southern end of the Bend Parkway section of US-97.

item.description: US-97 south at Powers Road Eastbound junction.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 139
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 139 - Reed Market Road/Old Mill District.

item.description: US-97 south at Truman Ave. intersection.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 138
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 138 - Downtown/Mt. Bachelor.

item.description: US-97 south at Hawthorne Ave. junction.

item.title: US-97 South - Lafayette Ave
item.description: US-97 south at Lafayette Ave. intersection.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 137
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 137 - Revere Ave./Downtown.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching Exit 136
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 136 - Butler Market Road.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 135A
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 135A - Business US-97/US-20/Business District/Burns.

item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 135A - US-20/Business District/Burns/Business US-97.

item.title: US-97 South at Tumalo Road Jct.
item.description: US-97 South at Tumalo Road/Deschutes Market Road junction.

item.title: US-97 South At 61st St. Jct.
item.description: US-97 South At 61st St./Gift Road junction.

item.title: US-97 South at Yew Ave. IC
item.description: US-97 south at Yew Ave interchange.

item.title: US-97 South - Overhead
item.description: US-97 south to Bend and Klamath Falls overhead.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-126 West
item.description: US-97 south at OR-126 west to Sisters and Salem. US-97 continues south towards Bend and Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-126 East
item.description: US-97 South approaching OR-126 East (Evergreen Ave.) Use OR-126 east for Prineville and John Day.

item.title: US-97 South at Antler Ave
item.description: US-97 south at Antler Ave junction.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 119
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 119 - US-97 Business/N. Redmond/N. Canal Blvd. This is the north end of the Redmond bypass. US-97 formerly followed the route of Business US-97 through downtown Redmond. The new bypass runs to the east of the old highway.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-370 (O'Neil Highway)
item.description: US-97 south at OR-370 to O’Neill and Lone Pine. OR-370 is not signed as such at this junction, but is part of the O’Neil Highway. This is part of the Oregon State Highway system that did not have a posted route number. In recent years the Oregon Department of Transportation has been assigning numbers to routes that have previously been unsigned.

item.title: US-97 South
item.description: US-97 South shield, taken just south of the US-97/US-26 split south of Madras.

item.title: US-97 South/US-26 East at Split
item.description: US-97 South/US-26 East at US-97/US-26 split. Turn left for US-26 east to Prineville, Mitchell, and John Day.

item.title: US-97 South/US-26 East at Split
item.description: US-97 South/US-26 East at US-97/US-26 Split. Turn left to continue on US-26.

item.title: US-97 South at US-26
item.description: US-97 south at US-26. Turn right for US-26 west to Portland. Turn left for US-26 east and US-97 south to Redmond, Prineville, and Bend. US-26 joins US-97 south through Madras.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching US-26
item.description: US-97 south approaching US-26 in Madras.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-293
item.description: US-97 south at OR-293. Use OR-293 east to Antelope, John Day Fossil Beds, and Fossil.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-293
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-293 in Jefferson County.

item.title: US-97 South at US-197
item.description: US-97 south at US-197. Use US-97 south for Madras and Bend. The northbound destination sign for US-197 was knocked over and lying on the ground.

item.title: US-97 South at US-197
item.description: US-97 south at US-197 junction. Taken at Shaniko Junction.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-218
item.description: US-97 south at OR-218 to Antelope and Fossil. Continue south on US-97 for Maupin, Madras, and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-218
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-218 in Shaniko.

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south. Distance to Shaniko and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-216
item.description: US-97 south at OR-216. Use OR-216 west for Sherars Bridge, Tygh Valley, and Deschutes River Recreation Area.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-216
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-216 west - Sherars Bridge Highway.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-206 Interchange
item.description: US-97 South at OR-206 Interchange to Wasco and Condon.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-206 IC
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-206 interchange to Wasco and Condon.

item.title: US-97 South - Entering Oregon
item.description: Entering Oregon on US-97 south, crossing the Columbia River.

item.title: US-97 North at WA-14
item.description: US-97 north at WA-14 north. US-97 north joins WA-14 west for about two miles. Turn right on WA-14 east for Kennewick. Turn left on WA-14 west for Vancouver. Also turn left for US-97 north to Yakima and Goldendale.

item.title: US-97 North - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on US-97 north. The welcome sign is about a mile north of the actual state line at the Columbia River.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84/US-30 West
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 West (Exit 104). Turn left for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles. Continue north on US-97 towards Yakima (Washington). US-97 crosses over the Columbia River into Washington immediately north of this junction. The Columbia River and the hills of Washington state are in the background of this photograph.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84/US-30 (Exit 104)
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 (Exit 104) junction. Turn right on I-84/US-30 east for Rufus and Pendleton. Continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles. The Columbia River, and bridge over the Columbia River into Washington is in the background of the photograph.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84 Frontage Road
item.description: I-84 north at I-84 Frontage Road, and approaching I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left on the Frontage Road for Deschutes State Park. Continue north on US-97 for I-84 junction, and Yakima (Washington). The Columbia River and Washington state are in the background of the photograph.

item.title: OR-206 West at US-97
item.description: OR-206 west at US-97 onramp. Turn right for US-97 north to Biggs Junction and The Dalles. Continue over the highway for US-97 southbound ramp to Bend.

item.title: OR-206 West In Wasco
item.description: OR-206 west on Clark St. at Armsworthy St. in Wasco. Turn left on Armsworthy St. to continue on OR-206 for Fulton Canyon, (Wasco) City Park and US-97. Turn right for the Wasco Airport.

item.title: OR-206 West at Clark St. - Wasco
item.description: OR-206 west at Clark St. in Wasco. Turn left on Clark St. south to US-97 South towards Moro and Grass Valley. Turn right on Clark St. for US-97 north, OR-206 west to Biggs Jct. and The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 104
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 104 - US-97/Yakima/Bend. US-97 is the major north/south highway through Central Oregon, connecting Klamath Falls with Bend. US-97 crosses the Columbia River into Washington just north of here.

item.title: OR-140 East at US-97 North
item.description: OR-140 east at US-97 north. Use US-97 north of Klamath Falls and Bend. Continue east on OR-140 for Lakeview, and OR-39 to Merill. OR-140 meets OR-39 on the east side of Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-66/OR-140
item.description: US-97 south at OR-66/OR-140 junction. Use OR-66/OR-140 west for Keno, Ashland, and Medford. Use OR-140 east for Lakeview. This is the eastern end of OR-66.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 277
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 277 - OR-66/OR-140/Lakeview/Medford.

item.title: US-97 South at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive
item.description: US-97 south offramp at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive. Use Oregon Ave. for City Center (Klamath Falls). Use Lakeshore Drive for Lake of the Woods

item.title: US-97 South at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive Exit
item.description: US-97 south at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive exit. Oregon Ave. heads east into downtown Klamath Falls. Lakeshore Drive follows the west shore of Klamath Lake before joining up with OR-140.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-39/Bus. US-97
item.description: US-97 south at OR-39/Bus.US-97 south to Klamath Falls and Reno (Nevada). US-97 continues south towards Weed and San Francisco (California).

item.title: US-97 South Approaching Bus. US-97/OR-39
item.description: US-97 south approaching Bus. US-97/OR-39. Continue south on US-97 for Weed and San Francisco.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-62
item.description: US-97 south at OR-62 to Fort Klamath and Crater Lake.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-62
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-62 junction.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 247
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 247 - OR-422/Chiloquin/Crater Lake.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 247
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 247 - Fort Klamath/Sprague River.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 247
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 247 - OR-422/Chiloquin/Crater Lake.

item.title: Silver Lake Road at US-97
item.description: Silver Lake Road at US-97. Use US-97 south for Klamath Falls. Use US-97 north for Chemult.

item.title: US-97 North - Silver Lake Road
item.description: US-97 north at Silver Lake Road. Use Silver Lake Road for Klamath Marsh National Wildlife Refuge HQ and Silver Lake.

item.title: End US-97 South at I-5
item.description: End US-97 South at I-5 south onramp (Exit 747). Turn left for I-5 south to Redding. Turn left for the College of the Siskiyous.

item.title: US-97 South at Weed Blvd.
item.description: US-97 south at Weed Blvd. Use Weed Blvd. north (BL-5/CA-265) for I-5 to Yreka. Use Weed Blvd. south (BL-5/US-97) to continue on US-97 and for I-5 south to Redding.

item.title: US-97 South at CA-161
item.description: US-97 south at CA-161 east to Tulelake. Tulelake is 23 miles east of here.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching CA-161
item.description: US-97 south approaching CA-161 east to Tulelake. CA-161 parallels the Oregon-California border east across the Klamath Basin.

item.title: Welcome To California - US-97 South
item.description: Welcome to California on US-97 south. Siskiyou County Line. Taken at the Oregon-California border.

item.title: US-97 South - Worden
item.description: Entering the community of Worden on US-97 south.

item.title: US-97 South Overhead
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south for Weed, and OR-66/OR-140 junction. Leaving the city of Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South - Klamath Falls City Center Exit
item.description: US-97 south approaching the Klamath Falls City Center exit.

item.title: US-20 East/US-97 Business at US-97 South
item.description: US-20 West/Business US-97 South at Division St./Downtown exit. Approaching US-97 South/Mt. Bachelor/Klamath Falls exit.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 135A
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 135A - US-20/US-97 Business/Business District/Burns.

item.title: US-97 North - Exit 135A
item.description: US-97 north at Exit 135A - US-20 West/Sisters/Salem.

item.title: US-97 North Approaching Exit 135A - US-20
item.description: US-97 north approaching Exit 135A. Use left lanes for US-97 North/Redmond/Portland.

item.title: US-97 North - Exit 137
item.description: US-97 north at Exit 137 - Revere Ave./Downtown.

item.title: US-97 North - Exit 138
item.description: US-97 north at Exit 138 - Downtown/Mt. Bachelor

item.title: Reed Market Road at US-97 Exit 139
item.description: Reed Market Road west at US-97 junction. Use US-97 north for Redmond. Use US-97 south for Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-138
item.description: US-97 south at OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) west to Diamond Lake, Medford, and Roseburg.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-138
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) to Diamond Lake, Roseburg, and Medford.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching WA-17
item.description: US-97 south approaching WA-17 South to Bridgeport and Moses Lake.

item.title: WA-20 East at US-97
item.description: WA-20 east at US-97. WA-20 follows US-97 north from here. Use US-97 south for Wenatchee. Use US-97 north for Penticton (Canada).

item.title: WA-20 East at WA-215
item.description: WA-20 east to US-97 at WA-215 North to Okanogan and Omak.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 104 Offramp at US-97
item.description: I-84 west Exit 104 offramp at US-97. Use US-97 north for Yakima. Use US-97 south for Deschutes Park/Wasco/Bend.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 104
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 104 - US-97/Yakima/Bend

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 37
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 37 - US-97 South/Goldendale/Bend, Ore. US-97 joins I-82 west to I-90 near Ellensburg. I-82/US-12 overhead to Richland and Pendleton.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 36
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 36 - Union Gap/Valley Mall Blvd.

item.title: I-82 East - Exits 33A and 33B
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 33A - Fair Ave./Lincoln Ave. and Exit 33B - Yakima Ave./Terrace Heights.

item.title: US-12 East at I-82/US-97
item.description: US-12 east at I-82 West/US-97 North to Selah and Ellensburg. US-12 east joins I-82 east here to Richland.

item.title: US-12 East at N 1st St - Approaching I-82/US-97
item.description: US-12 east at N 1st St exit. Approaching I-82 junction.

item.title: US-12 East Approaching I-82/US-97
item.description: US-12 east approaching I-82 - north to Selah and Ellensburg - south to Goldendale and Richland.

item.description: Advance signs for I-82/US-97 junction on US-12 east.

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 104, US-97/Yakima/Bend, 1 mile.

item.description: WA-14 east approaching US-97 north to Goldendale and Yakima, 1 mile.

item.description: WA-14 east at US-97 north to Goldendale and Yakima. US-97 joins WA-14 east for a mile.

item.description: WA-14 East/US-97 South to Kennewick and Bend, just east of US-97 north junction.

item.description: Northern end of OR-230 at OR-138 to Roseburg and Bend.

item.description: US-97 north approaching OR-58 to Oakridge and Eugene.
